PDDL Actions:

```lisp
(:action obtain_fizzy_drink
  :parameters (?p - player ?f - faucet ?fd - fizzy_drink)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?f) (available ?fd))
  :effect (and (inventory ?p ?fd) (not (available ?fd)))
)

(:action pour_fizzy_drink
  :parameters (?p - player ?f - faucet ?fd - fizzy_drink ?b - old_bolt)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?f) (inventory ?p ?fd) (at ?b ?f))
  :effect (and (not (inventory ?p ?fd)) (on ?fd ?b))
)

(:action wipe_clean
  :parameters (?p - player ?t - towel ?b - old_bolt ?fd - fizzy_drink)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?b) (inventory ?p ?t) (on ?fd ?b))
  :effect (and (not (on ?fd ?b)) (on ?fd ?t) (clean ?b))
)

(:action dissolve_rust
  :parameters (?p - player ?b - old_bolt ?fd - fizzy_drink)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?b) (on ?fd ?b))
  :effect (and (rust_dissolved ?b) (not (on ?fd ?b)))
)

(:action replace_bolt
  :parameters (?p - player ?b - old_bolt)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?b) (rust_dissolved ?b))
  :effect (and (not (stuck ?b)) (new ?b))
)
```

These actions should capture the intent and logic of the provided steps and descriptions. The preconditions and effects are based on the entity states before and after each action.
